text: Machida Station(町田駅,まちだえき) is a Railway station of JR East and Odakyu Electric Railway in Machida, Tokyo, Japan. == Neighbor == ;JR East :Yokohama Line ::Rapid :::Nagatsuda - Machida - Sagamihara ::Local :::Naruse - Machida - Kobuchi ;Odakyu Electric Railway :Odawara Line ::Rapid Express, Express :::Shin-Yurigaoka - Machida - Sagami-Ōno ::Semi Express, Section Semi Express, Local :::Tamagawagakuen-mae - Machida - Sagami-Ōno Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Machida Station
